objects.text:
• Premium 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Classic Design with Modern Ergonomics
• Advanced Electronic Viewfinder
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Vintage-inspired classic design with modern ergonomics
• Advanced electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for flexible shooting angles
• Fast autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Film Simulation modes for creative expression
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Durable metal construction with premium finish
• High-performance electronic shutter up to 1/32000 sec
• Enhanced grip design for comfortable handling

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional design featuring a high-quality camera product. The composition places the product image prominently on the right side, while all essential text elements are aligned to the left for visual hierarchy. The "heading" layer serves as the bold and dominant title in uppercase white font. Below it, the "subheading" in red uses a stylized techno typeface to emphasize the product category. The "description" layer lists four key features in bullet points. The "tagline" offers a stylish message about the product's essence. Price is emphasized boldly in the "price" layer. "cta_button" and "cta" create a bright red button with a clear call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**  
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`  
- Deep Gray: `#2D2D2D`  
- True Black: `#121212`  
- Bold Red: `#FF3B30`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0`
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, primarily designed in a sleek matte black finish (#1A1A1A), which conveys a professional and high-end feel. Metallic accents in deep gray (#3D3D3D) and the glossy lens glass—highlighting soft greenish (#A5C39C), yellow (#F2E379), and blue tints (#6DA7C8)—create striking reflections that add sophistication. White markings (#FFFFFF) for text and dials stand out sharply, enhancing readability and sharp contrast. The orange aperture marker (#FFA500) offers a pop of color, drawing focus to the control details. These elements are tastefully blended while ensuring functional components are visually distinct, perfect for a modern, tech-forward ad banner.
